channel.title: Help with rollbacks
channel.description: my players are having ramdom roll back and i dont know why i would really like if someone would help....

get a dedicated server and you wouldnt have that problem

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:20, topic:451002”]why would he terminate without saving? or at least terminate properly…[/quote]Computer freezes or crashes. Terminates through task manager by accident. I don’t get what you’re asking.

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Could you tell us what you are doing that makes you give this “random rollback”??? Did you do a proper logout? Or were you blatantly kicked or server was exited.?

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:12, topic:451002”]Good lord. Shut down hook? ever heard of one?[/quote]That would work in some cases, but not if the owner terminates the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

matzie:

I would make it save in decent sized intervals, and on “important actions” like trade complete, declined, item picked up… or stuff like that :o

well i see that people tryed to explain to him other ways. but if he is having roll backs as often as he says he is, this can fix it for now until he starts to understand the source i guess

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:15, topic:451002”][quote author=mangas lol link=topic=553889.msg4057671#msg4057671 date=1343135360]

Im using trisidia-x’s source… i have chnage serval save_timers no it save ever 30 secondes , before it wast saving until the player loggs out
[/quote]well i thinks its better than loosing the whole account stats & items

You do realize that saving every 30 seconds means that I will lose the XP or items I gained 29 seconds subsequent to a prior save (if I get kicked)…

What? I’m saying it should save more often.[/quote]
well ok if u want it to save more often u can do this.
go into client.java and look for

above that add this coding

public void AutoSaveGame() {
		EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
			public void execute(EventContainer c) {
				int r3 = 0;
				r3 = Misc.random(6);
				if (r3 == 0) {
					SaveGame();
				} else if (r3 == 3) {
					SaveGame();
				} else if (r3 == 4) {
					SaveGame();
				} else if (r3 == 5) {
					SaveGame();
				}
			}
		}, 500); ///Server Auto Save  in Milliseconds!
	};

now look for

under that add this

not where it says

thats wher u change the time where it mass saves your server.
this could cause a little lag if u have a lot of players but there is the one you asked for

Read full topic

You do realize that saving every 30 seconds means that I will lose the XP or items I gained 29 seconds subsequent to a prior save (if I get kicked)…
[/quote][/quote]

What? I’m saying it should save more often.

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:6, topic:451002”]Edited title and content of OP.

ravekitty, that was unnecessary.

ravekitty, what exactly is the point of your post other than blatant spam?

Anyhow, for the op: Before I help you further, I just want to make sure your save times aren’t far apart as I’ve seen this happen in some cases in the past

Saving every 30 seconds is probably the reason your players are being rolled back.[/quote]
Sorry ~_~

[quote=“mangas lol, post:5, topic:451002”][quote author=casey. link=topic=553889.msg4057618#msg4057618 date=1343127555]
ravekitty, what exactly is the point of your post other than blatant spam?

Anyhow, for the op: Before I help you further, I just want to make sure your save times aren’t far apart as I’ve seen this happen in some cases in the past.
[/quote]i have done something now it saves every 30 secondes…[/quote]
Assuming you’re using project insanity…
I’m pretty sure this is handled in the config class

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Edited title and content of OP.

ravekitty, that was unnecessary.

ravekitty, what exactly is the point of your post other than blatant spam?

Anyhow, for the op: Before I help you further, I just want to make sure your save times aren’t far apart as I’ve seen this happen in some cases in the past.
[/quote]i have done something now it saves every 30 secondes…[/quote]

Saving every 30 seconds is probably the reason your players are being rolled back.
